text:
# Reports

MaivenPoint Online Services provides comprehensive user activity report and
detailed notification delivery reports, which track the status of both email
and SMS notifications sent through the system.

To enhance usability, these reports include filtering and search options,
allowing administrators to quickly locate specific records. Additionally, for
added convenience and data analysis, users have the option to export these
reports into an XLSX file format.

User activity report.

Email delivery report.

SMS delivery report.

# Reports

MaivenPoint Online Services provides comprehensive user activity report and
detailed notification delivery reports, which track the status of both email
and SMS notifications sent through the system.

To enhance usability, these reports include filtering and search options,
allowing administrators to quickly locate specific records. Additionally, for
added convenience and data analysis, users have the option to export these
reports into an XLSX file format.

User activity report.

Email delivery report.

SMS delivery report.
